title: Best of The Herd: 12/07/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/07/2018
description:
Colin thinks the most predictable game of the weekend is the Packers blowing out the Falcons because Aaron Rodgers will want to show everyone that their struggles were Mike mcCarthy's fault. He pleads with LeBron James to not bring in his friend Carmelo Anthony. Plus, The MMQB's Albert Breer explains why Josh McDaniels is more likely to become the next Packers head coach not Jim Harbaugh 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
